animals.animalText: You are cunning, sneaky, and always there. Very cute, but also known to be a bit of a pest.
You are adored by everybody, you are really good at getting the job done, although some may say you love what you do TOO much.
Quiet, watchful, you are naturally curious. You appreciate the small things in life, especially when they are trying to escape.
Fanciful, with an ever present optimism, your presence is always appreciated.
While you come across as a little frazzled, you are methodical, cautious, and take your time when getting to know people.
You love affection, attention, and food. There is nothing more enjoyable to you than a good nap after a great day out with your friends.
You are at that point in life where you know yourself well enough to know exactly what you need at all times. Go you.
You barrell your way through life, ever in the present moment, no concerns about the past or the future.
